Articles.Content:
This is what happen after a while, clicking "v" to change the camera view on Mun surface. My Kerbal is fell down as if there were no ground.

[![rcEltcFh.png](http://i.imgur.com/rcEltcFh.png)](http://i.imgur.com/rcEltcF.png)

If you can reproduce this, please try to find exact steps and upload your output\_log.txt and/or a quicksave. If you're not sure where to find that, please read the [thread=92230]Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide[/thread].
